snippet.title: CPCMiniPac - Amstrad CPC Homebrew
snippet.description:
Developed as part of a BASIC 10Liner Competition in 2023.

CPCMiniPac is a game based on Pac-Man. The aim is to eat all the points without getting caught by a ghost. It is controlled with the arrow keys.

There are 2 big dots that cannot be eaten.

However, the ghosts can pass these points. So be careful!

It runs on an Amstrad CPC-6128 and is written in Locomotive Basic 1.1.

Download link: https://bunsen.itch.io/cpcminipac-by-stefan-hasenhutl

#basic #basic10liner #amstradcpc #amstrad #amstradcpc464 #homebrew #pacman #cpcretrodev #cpc #cpcminipac #retrogames #retrogaming
